localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Sivo provides debt as a service. Our API allows companies to access debt funding and lend money to their users at scale. Sivo is backed by Y Combinator (W21).
nodes.title: Sivo - Access debt funding and lend money to users at scale
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: HomeWerk helps teams to socialize and build stronger relationships regardless of location, time-zone and position within a company. We provide consistently positive automated team building sessions to keep teams talking about everything, apart from work!
nodes.title: HomeWerk - Helping teams stay happy whilst working remotely
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Octohook is a no-code web application that helps you visualize, debug and redistribute your webhooks via powerful workflows.
nodes.title: Octohook - Catch webhooks and send them through powerful workflows
nodes.author: Loris Leiva

nodes.excerpt: Want to deliver higher quality software cheaper and faster? Then Code Quality Guide is something you were looking for. It is a comprehensive and practical guide for those who want to improve the quality of code with the best techniques and strategies.
nodes.title: Complete Code Quality Guide - Learn everything you should know about code quality
nodes.author: Artem Galenko

nodes.excerpt: Verbz is a voice productivity app for teams. Create notes, assign tasks, make announcements, run stand-ups, or just chat. Talk or type, listen or read.
nodes.title: Verbz - Create tasks, notes, and chat, all with voice
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Design is a continually changing environment. Whatâ€™s cool one day, is old the next. So designers always have to be on their toes - itâ€™s a pretty hectic gig. And this is where Yizy comes into play!
nodes.title: Yizy - Give Meaning to your Screenshots and Bookmarks!
nodes.author: Eyobiel Andebrhan

nodes.excerpt: cvlogin.com is your free online CV generator that helps you to create a professional resume within minutes. Global job seekers benefit with ready to download CV templates in 12 languages such as Arabic, English, French, German, Hindi or Spanish. Try it now!ğŸš€
nodes.title: cvlogin - Create your professional resume in 12 languages
nodes.author: Mike Kleinemail

nodes.excerpt: After more than 150,000 happy customers on the Mac App Store, MeetInOne - the all-in-one Google Meet desktop app - is finally coming to the Windows Store. Get the app now & enjoy a 50% discount on our one-time pricing. The discount is valid until next Sunday.
nodes.title: MeetInOne - The all-in-one Google Meet desktop app for Windows

nodes.excerpt: Back-to-back video calls stressing you out? Give yourself (and everyone else attending your next meeting) a chance to pause by adding a 2min guided audio meditation before entering the call. Works with whatever video software you use.
nodes.title: Mindful Meetings - Add a 2min guided meditation to any video link
nodes.author: Calvin Benton

nodes.excerpt: Remote usability testing tool that supports both qualitative and quantitative research. Eye tracking, emotion recognition, heatmaps, replays, interactive polls, live sessions and much more by simply sharing a link.
nodes.title: Mupixa 2.0 - Remote usability testing, eye tracking, heatmaps, replays
nodes.author: Vladimir Daskalov

nodes.excerpt: A Searchable Airtable database with over 200+ Curated Resources to include templates, essays, articles, and frameworks to help aspiring PM's and Startups Learn Product Management.
nodes.title: Docdrop - Database of 200+ product management learning resources
nodes.author: Seth Fannin

nodes.excerpt: RelaxTax is the first App in Austria, that is able to create automated tax returns with an electronic submission & follow up to the Austrian Tax Authorities (FinanzOnline). It is available in multiple languages, currently German & English, with more to come.
nodes.title: RelaxTax - Simplified tax returns for Austria
nodes.author: Chris Eberl

nodes.excerpt: Doppler Share is an easy way to share one-off secrets in a simple end-to-end encrypted way where the links auto-expire after a certain number of views and days.
nodes.title: Doppler Share - Share one-off secrets with end-to-end encryption ğŸ¤«
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Acumen is the secret weapon dev teams use to deliver high-quality software on time. The platform unifies and analyzes engineering data to create a high-res picture of the teamâ€™s activities and recommends steps to avoid risks and boost productivity.
nodes.title: Acumen - GPS for software engineering teams
nodes.author: Eran Abramson

nodes.excerpt: Friday is an asynchronous platform that helps accelerate the transition to working from anywhere. Roadmap your day, stay in sync with your team, and stay connected without another meeting.
nodes.title: Friday 2.0 - Async operating system for remote work
nodes.author: Ryan Gum

nodes.excerpt: DocAcquire eliminates MANUAL DATA ENTRY by extracting data from ANY Document and make it available FASTER.
nodes.title: DocAcquire - Extract data from ANY document faster
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: StoryXpress is a video platform for high performing teams with a suite of video tools- webcam & screen recorder, video hosting, video editing & video analytics engine. With custom branding and powerful integrations for sales, marketing customer support tools.
nodes.title: StoryXpress - Video Platform for High Performing Teams
nodes.author: Ankit Mishra

nodes.excerpt: Collaborate through all phases of the product development process in Kitemaker and keep track of work across Slack, Discord, Figma, and Github. It's still super-fast and has even more hotkeys.
nodes.title: Kitemaker - A fast tool for product collaboration and discussions
nodes.author: Sean Percival

nodes.excerpt: Improve your teams collaboration and invite them to your very own shared digital whiteboard. Just start a new project and draw away. Our web whiteboard is incredibly fast and simple to use, so anyone can do it. Yeah including Phil from accounting.
nodes.title: Online Whiteboard - Easy to use online whiteboard where you can share anything
nodes.author: Perry Steward

nodes.excerpt: Go Mail Merge enables you to send bulk personalized emails with personalized attachments easily from Google Sheets. Create email campaigns with Gmail and Google Sheets. Personalize & track each email sent.
nodes.title: Go Mail Merge - Send bulk personalized emails with personalized attachments
nodes.author: Rami

nodes.excerpt: Are you a start up or a solo founder? don't have much funds to hire an animator/video editor to show case your product? worry not! videofork.co is here for you!! A free web based animation tool to create explainer videos for your startup/side project.
nodes.title: Videofork.co - Create explainer videos & GIFs for your startup for free

nodes.excerpt: We can not share links when we are speaking in podcasts or clubhouse rooms. Hupu, creates numbers for your links and people who wants to reach, enter number to hupu app or webpage and reach links without sign-in.
nodes.title: Hupu - Share a link with your audience via numbers
